success_msg_successfully_logged_out: You have been successfully logged out.
success_msg_you_are_now_accessing_locker: You are now accessing locker bank {{lockerBankName}}
warning_msg_please_accept_tnc: Please accept terms and conditions to book a new locker or to open your locker.
warning_msg_enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
warning_msg_enter_valid_mobile: Please enter a valid mobile number.
warning_msg_do_not_reload_or_close_tab: Please do not reload or close the tab when the transaction is being processed.
warning_msg_max_lockers_booked_release_b: You have booked maximum number of lockers allowed. Please release a locker before booking a new one.
error_msg_error_while_opening_qr_reader: There was an error while opening QR reader. Please try again.
error_msg_scanned_qr_not_valid: The scanned QR code is not valid. Please scan the QR code on the locker bank.
error_msg_could_not_recognise_locker_ban: We couldn't recognise the locker bank you are trying to access. Please scan the QR code on the locker bank and try again.
error_msg_error_while_fetching_locker_ba: An error occured while fetching locker bank settings. Please try again.
error_msg_locker_bank_under_maintenance_: The locker bank you are trying to access is under maintenance. Please try again.
error_msg_transaction_successful_but_una: Transaction was successful but we were unable to verify the payment details. Please wait for the confirmation on My Lockers page after redirection.
error_msg_locker_units_not_available_try: There are no locker units available in the locker bank you are trying to access. Pleast try later.
error_msg_locker_bank_is_under_different: The locker bank you are trying to access is under different tenant.
error_msg_error_occured_while_sending_ot: An error occured while sending OTP. Please try again.
error_msg_otp_invalid_enter_correct_otp: Entered OTP is invalid. Please enter correct OTP.
error_msg_otp_expired_click_resend_to_ge: Entered OTP is expired. Please click on Resend OTP to get a new OTP.
error_msg_error_occured_while_verifying_: An error occured while verifying OTP. Please try again.
error_msg_error_occured_while_checking_a: An error occured while checking available locker sizes. Please try again
error_msg_error_occured_while_fetching_y: An error occured while fetching your lockers. Please try again.
error_msg_error_occured_while_initiating: An error occured while initiating payment. Please try again.
error_msg_unexpected_error_while_initiat: There was an unexpected error while initiating payment. Please login and try again.
error_msg_error_occured_while_verifying_: An error occured while verifying transaction details.
error_msg_error_occured_while_opening_yo: An error occured while opening your locker. Please try again.
error_msg_error_occured_while_releasing_: An error occured while releasing your locker. Please try again.
error_msg_invalid_token_login_and_try_ag: Invalid token. Please login and try again.
error_msg_something_went_wrong_try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.
locker_bank_not_recognised: We couldn't recognise the locker bank you are trying to access. To book a new locker or to open your locker, please scan the QR code on the locker bank.
locker_bank_under_maintenance: The locker bank is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.
mobile_login_available_only_for_indian_n: Currently mobile login is available only for Indian numbers. If you don't have an Indian number, please try email login as an alternative.
review_following_details_before_initiati: Please review following details before initiating transaction.
wait_till_payment_is_confirmed: Please wait a moment while we're confirming your payment.
do_not_go_back_or_reload_the_page: Do not go back or reload this page.
close_the_locker_after_use: Please close the locker properly after use.
are_you_sure_to_release_the_locker: Are you sure you want to release this locker?
check_belongings_before_releasing_locker: Please make sure you have taken all your belongings from the locker before releasing.
take_belongings_and_close_locker: Please take all your belongings and close the locker properly.
verifying_locker_bank_settings_please_wa: Verifying locker bank settings. Please wait.
are_you_sure_to_logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
error_while_retrieving_lockers: There was an error while retrieving lockers assigned to you. Please try again.
booking_time_over_msg: Your booking time is over. Please pay extra usage fees to open your locker.
booking_time_over_grace_time_msg: Your booking time is over. You've been allocated extra {{bookingGraceTime}} minutes. Please take your belongings and release the locker before the timer runs out. Once the timer ends, you'll be charged extra for overusage.
know_more_text: To know more about us please visit us at
terms_para_one: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Durolt's Website, located at
terms_para_two: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Durolt if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
terms_para_three: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: 'Client', 'You' and 'Your' refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company's terms and conditions. 'The Company', 'Ourselves', 'We', 'Our' and 'Us', refers to our Company. 'Party', 'Parties', or 'Us', refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client's needs in respect of provision of the Company's stated services.  Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.
cookies_para_one: We employ the use of cookies. By accessing Durolt, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the Durolt's Privacy Policy.
cookies_para_two: Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the user's details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies.
license_para_one: Unless otherwise stated, Durolt and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Durolt. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Durolt for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
license_sub_point_two: Sell, rent or sub-license material from Durolt
license_sub_point_three: Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from Durolt
license_para_two: This Agreement shall begin on the date here of 22/07/2022.
license_para_three: Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. Durolt does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Durolt , its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Durolt shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.
license_para_four: Durolt reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.
license_para_five: You hereby grant Durolt a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media.
warrant_subpoint_one: You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so;
warrant_subpoint_two: The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party;
warrant_subpoint_three: The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy
warrant_subpoint_four: The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity.
hyperlink_following_title: The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:
hyperlink_subPoint_four: Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and
hyperlink_subpoint_five: System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.
hyperlink_para_one: These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party's site.
hyperlink_para_two: We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations:
org_type_subpoint_one: commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources;
org_type_subpoint_five: accounting, law and consulting firms; and
org_type_para_one: We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of Durolt; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.
org_type_para_two: These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party's site.
org_type_para_three: If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to Durolt. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.
org_hyperlink_web_title: Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows:
hyperlink_web_subpoint_one: By use of our corporate name; or
hyperlink_web_subpoint_two: By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or
hyperlink_web_subpoint_three: By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party's site.
noUseWarning: No use of Durolt's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement.
iframeParaOne: Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.
contentLiabilityParaOne: We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.
reservationRightPara: We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it's linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.
linkRemovalTitle: Removal of links from our website
linkRemovalParaOne: If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.
linkRemovalParaTwo: We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date.
disclaimerParaOne: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:
disclaimerSubpointOne: limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;
disclaimerSubPointTwo: limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;
disclaimerSubPointThree: limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or
disclaimerSubPointFour: exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law
disclaimerParaTwo: The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.
disclaimerParaThree: As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.
